SELECT COUNT (logSeq) cnt FROM ( SELECT LOG_SEQ logSeq , LOG_CLIENT_IP logClientIp , LOG_ID logId , LOG_DT logDt , LOG_DIVN logDivn
,CASE WHEN LOG_DIVN = 'ma' THEN (SELECT FAIL_CNT failCnt FROM t_ad_user tau WHERE tau.ID = tll.LOG_ID) WHEN LOG_DIVN = 'ft' THEN (SELECT ME_FAIL_CNT failCnt FROM t_member tm WHERE tm.ME_ID = tll.LOG_ID) ELSE '' END failCnt
FROM t_log_log tll
WHERE 1 = 1
GROUP BY LOG_ID HAVING failCnt > 5
ORDER BY logDt DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex} , #{recordCountPerPage}
